website_summaries.verdict: A solid exercise ball that works well as an office chair.
pros: This exercise ball is good for sitting or exercising alike, and it doesn't have an egg as some competitors do
Comes in four colors and multiple sizes
cons: Some customers reported that this ball is easy to pop

customer_reviews.title: Choose this exercise ball.
customer_reviews.text: This 65cm ball is wonderful! Got it for PT and haven’t been disappointed. I purchased a less expensive brand at the same time with the hopes of having one at home and one at work and I had to send the cheaper one back. This ball however is perfect and worth the extra money. Easy to inflate, no harsh smell, and the inflated size matches what it’s listed as.
customer_reviews.author: H&Ivy

customer_reviews.title: 55cm too small as a desk chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my desk and since the suggestion for my 5'2" is the 55cm that's the one I bought. Even after waiting 24hours after pumping to let the ball expand to it's full size, it was too small for my desk height of 30". I purchased the 65cm next which was perfect as my desk chair but now I'm stuck with two exercise balls since I couldn't even really return the 55cm since there's a charge for returning it. You'll see in the picture the difference of the 55cm (left) and the 65cm.
customer_reviews.author: fivetwo beauty

customer_reviews.title: 5-Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great exercise ball. Definitely feels more heavy duty than my last one and I am much more comfortable using my heavy weights on this and retiring my weight bench to save room in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Many different uses, and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool, for both therapy, rehab, as well as strength training. Make sure to get the right size. The ball is very well made, and comes with two extra air plugs, as well as a plastic wedge to remove plug and deflate if needed; also comes with air pump. Great for whole body strength. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: "rben82776"

customer_reviews.title: Not 2000lb. Box clearly says 1100lb
customer_reviews.text: Really wish that companies would just be upfront. They wrote 2000lb all over this advertising, but it's actually 1100. Just Sad. Anybody care to reply?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality that holds air over time!
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of poor examples of these balls around, many are too thin, or don't hold air over time, but this one so far has been great, I haven't had to refill it and it appears to be keeping its size/pressure perfectly. I would not hesitate to buy another or recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: ToddTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Be careful! Had this stability ball sitting on a wood shelf and there was some sort of weird chemical reaction where the ball stuck to the shelf, and the stain and finish literally melted. The ball is ruined and the shelf is also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $6. to return!?
customer_reviews.text: This is a Prime item for us but they want 6 bucks to return it, this really burns me. Physical therapists at the in patient rehab facility where my husband recently got knee replacement surgery told me to get one for home therapy but the home PT's didn't ever use it or feel it was necessary at all. Our house is too small to have useless things hanging around and it is too large for me to use. Very annoyed about the return charge, wouldn't have ordered it from this company if I had known.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Plug can’t be made Flush with Surface of the Ball. Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.text: This item was obviously a return, since the packaging was done by some four legged animal. The company ignored the reason for the return. The hole is too small for the plug. Thus, the plug sticks out dangerously, and can’t be made flush with the surface of the ball. I have literally tried everything. Returns are impossible since time out of the office is not easy at this juncture. I am forced to keep this factory mistake. It is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Philip L. Gissen

customer_reviews.title: Cannot inflate - hand pump stalls
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little baffled by everyone else's reviews that the ball is easy to inflate. I've been working at this for an hour and the ball is still less than 10% inflated. The pump seems to stall out every 20 strokes or so, and gets "stuck" in one position. It then takes some effort/patience to wait until it unsticks and will function again. I'm guessing I have a defective pump, but I'm having trouble figuring out how to contact DynaPro to ask for a replacement. The ball also has a really strong chemical smell that hasn't gone away after a full day outside the box. Yuck. I am frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product/Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We received the exercise ball and started to inflate it as per the instructions. The hand pump initially did well but as the ball inflated it did not function. I contacted DynaPro via their Facebook link. In a few hours I received a message back apologizing for the defective pump and after getting my address they shipped a new pump which we received promptly. The product is well made but their customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect multi use ball
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the 55cm for a 65cm as I was planning on using it as an office chair. As others have stated in their reviews, be sure to give the ball 24hours to expand and then pump it again for it to reach its proper size. The ball is great! You can tell that it is quality material and it has not deflated since I started using it daily a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Pon

customer_reviews.title: Pump is garbage
customer_reviews.text: The pump stopped working in the middle of trying to fill this ball. I will have to go buy a pump to fill it the rest of the way. Also regarding the pump, the tip of the pump is too fat so it only goes a tiny ways into the hole - VERY difficult to get the pumping started.
customer_reviews.author: E. Young

customer_reviews.title: Started deflating terribly after four months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product less than six months ago (May) for my wife to use during her pregnancy. She’s now in her 39th week and needs to be using the ball every day, but it has begun deflating severely overnight now so it has to be refilled every day in order to be used. 4 months is a disappointing lifespan for a product that leads you to believe it could last indefinitely, and a horrible time for it to happen too.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The "inflation" only lasted about 6 hours the first day ...
customer_reviews.text: The "inflation" only lasted about 6 hours the first day, then started shrinking so I added air. It lasted about an hour the second time; re-inflated it and in 30 minutes it was flat! Has to go back. Must have been one of the 4 PPM! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ronee Finch

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was horrible. I was highly concerned the product would be damaged when I first saw the package on the porch. Upon opening the package the product was as expected and intact. We ordered the 55inch ball. It took about 6 minutes for my teen to inflate manually with the hand pump. You will need good shoulders. With the ball infated completely, it is a strong sturdy rubber. Using it for gentle physical therapy on her knee. I assume it will hold up well. Feels very strong. Extra plugs and plug remover came with the package. 4 stars due to the poor packing.
customer_reviews.author: TrishaD

customer_reviews.title: Expected the ball to be round!
customer_reviews.text: The most basic element of a ball is its shape. My ball, when inflated, is significantly out of round. It is incapable of rolling in a straight line on a flat floor. The concept of an exercise ball is its symmetry will allow controlled and predictable movements to work safely in developing targeted muscles. This product fails. Amazon should question their affiliation with a company that sells this type of trash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: When completely inflated this ball sinks in when sat on. I ordered 2 in different sizes. The the ball recommended for my height was so small it had me almost sitting the floor when it sank in. I've had cheaper stability balls hold it's shape better. definitely not worth it. Returned one. Disappointed it's too late to return the 2nd.
customer_reviews.author: ~S~

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT INCLUDE PUMP
customer_reviews.text: No pump was included even tho the box clearly indicates that a pump is included.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 65 cm based on my height and it definitely does not feel like the correct size! It is much smaller than I expected and puts me in pretty much a squatting position. Also the pump stopped working halfway through so we had to get a different one to finish blowing it up. Also note that you can't return this item. I was planning on exchanging it for a 75 cm before I found this out. I was looking forward to using this ball during my pregnancy and labor in a couple months, so I'm definitely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Rozell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, a little difficult to inflate
customer_reviews.text: The ball works great -- purchased for my daughter and me, but it's been used by my husband on occasion as well, so everyone from 100 to 200+ pounds has been able to use it without an issue. Haven't had any problems with deflating or losing air. I deducted a star because it was difficult to fully inflate using the provided pump. My personal trainer ended up taking it for me and using her (better quality) pump to inflate it.
customer_reviews.author: Cascade book lover

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: So the ball literally was delivered same day so no complaints there. Ball appears very durable. I have 5 kids so it has also been used as a "bouncy toy" and has held up so far. I bought the smaller ball and would say that it is definitely on the small side I would say its for people 5'7" and shorter for sure. I am 5'8" and I actually prefer the bigger ball. The inflation device is a small handheld pump, while the ball did inflate reasonable well you will be pumping a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, professional grade and customer service backed product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that DYNAPRO customer service backs their product. That was the one feature that stood out when I was reading reviews about the exercise ball. You never know if you will need to use customer service, but if a seller does not back their product, I am not buying their product period. I could tell from the moment I took the ball out of the box that it was good quality. I am going to use my ball for back exercises I received from my physical therapist. He thought it was a wonderful idea to buy a ball and use it at home.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Some pros and some cons
customer_reviews.text: Seemingly well made, but the sizing was off on the 55 cm that I ordered - once inflated, it was a bit larger than a 65cm I own of another make. Amazon customer service also did not handle the return well.
customer_reviews.author: The Nevadans

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my exercise routine
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the ball to exercise my legs and strengthen my back. The ball arrived a day earlier than promised. The ball was exactly as described in advertisement. It was the right size for my height and very comfortable to sit on to strengthen core balance. The hand pump fell short of my expectations. It was so small that my hands were bumping each other, it took too many pumps to fill the ball, and you do have to pump it some more after letting it sit overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, Sturdy Ball
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it is a quality ball. I got this because I haven't been able to find a chair that I can sit in because of a back problem I suffered ten years ago. This ball is good for my lower back, but it still creates pressure on my sciatic nerve, especially when I inflated it to its maximum. The ball has settled a bit and is not so taut and I'm experiencing less pressure. I inflated the ball according to the instructions and sat on it. Then the next day I added a bit more air and then did the same thing the following day. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Munchkin46

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home exercising
customer_reviews.text: These are the exercise balls used at professional gyms, and with COVID, I wanted to find one for home use. It comes with clear instructions for inflating the ball. There was a "run" on these at the beginning of COVID, so I had to continue checking the site until my size was back in stock, but it was worth it. I do recommend ensuring you know the size ball you need to purchase based on your height, so that you don't get one that is too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tangier14

customer_reviews.title: Solid value
customer_reviews.text: While I personally am not a fan of companies pressing customers for reviews (it would seem to reflect a potentially dishonest bias), this ball has been very helpful in my daily life - from Stuart McGill's "Stirring the pot" exercise for back strength to Swiss Ball Core Workout by Declan Condron, I am finding it of singular value. I do wish, however, that it was a little easier to inflate properly: When I try to pump all the air indicated necessary in, it leaks so much every time I've not been able to get it to full capacity but I still use it even so.
customer_reviews.author: K. Springer

customer_reviews.title: 2000 lbs Capacity Exercise Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is great I'm a very big guy 540 lbs at my heaviest. This ball holds me and I can do many different exercises on it with the level of my physical ability at this time. This has been tested to 2000lbs and I talked to the company that makes them and they guaranteed me I will be fine on it. So as long as I can keep my balance, which isn't always the easiest as I get use to it, this is helping me and holding my weight. If something changes I'll come back and give an update.
customer_reviews.author: Videographer/Photographer

customer_reviews.title: DYNAPRO Exercise Ball is OK, the hand pump included in package is garbage
customer_reviews.text: The DYNAPRO Exercise Ball is OK, the hand pump included in package is garbage. The ball is OK, has held air pressure for a week now, appears to be sturdy enough, it is too soon to comment on durability. The ball is not exactly symmetric, but height is within approximately 1.75 inches (4.45 cm) of width. The hand pump included for inflation is garbage; to small to provide the air volume needed to inflate a larger ball and pump action is not smooth at all and frequently sticks.
customer_reviews.author: JU

customer_reviews.title: My newest friend
customer_reviews.text: I'm an IT guy and I struggle with getting in enough activity. I have a sit-stand desk, but my Dr recommended that I try an exercise ball to work on my core. I literally am just sitting on this thing. I can do nearly an hour at a stretch - it is a surprising amount of work. I can't speak for any fancy exercises on it yet, but I'm a big guy and it holds me up just fine. I do have to add air to it every few days to keep it firm. There it sits in my office waiting on the next round...
customer_reviews.author: Donald Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, only held up for about 6 months of very light use.
customer_reviews.text: For the purchase of a 55cm blue stability ball. *edit from 5 stars. Was great at first until a few months after the return window closed at which time this stopped holding air. Can't find any hole, tried one of the spare plugs, no use. It is sitting here, garbage, I hate to throw it away but nothing else I can do with it. I am 5' 3" & 200 pounds. Didn't do strenuous exercise on it, just sat on it occasionally and did some stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my pregnancy, feels great on my hips and back
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5 foot 4 and got the 65 cm size. It’s perfect for me and aligns my hips and knees perfectly. I’m pregnant and bought this for pain relief and it really really helps. It takes all the pressure off my low back and hips. I plan on using it during labor as well. This thing is also really thick and I trust it to not pop. I didn’t use the pump it came with to inflate but rather used an electric air mattress pump. It worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for physical therapy exercises in my home, and it doesn't hold air. After a day I have to keep putting more air in, which is very annoying. Probably going to go into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Pahket19

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Edit 10/22: The company has been very helpful in getting a replacement under the 1 year warranty, so I have updated my review. I purchased this in June and air began very slowly leaking out every time I used it for exercise or sitting. I just kept re-inflating it, but since my exercise ball did not come with the advertised pump, doing it manually is quite frustrating. Air now leaks out of it so quickly that I just gave up on using it. I still can't find the leak. The leaking problem seems to be very common from these reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in many ways of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this while pregnant to help relief back and hip pain and it has worked out really great so far. I plan to use of course after pregnancy as well but the point is it’s very comfortable and sturdy in use, is a great size, works so well for stretching and even just sitting when other surfaces are no longer comfortable. I haven’t had any problems with it remaining inflated. The hand pump that comes with it works great, and extra pieces to plug up as well help remove the plug if you need to adjust the air amount is available as well. I think it’s a great product, just as advertised, and was shipped and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jess U

customer_reviews.title: exploded today ; (
customer_reviews.text: Did not last long at all exploded for no reason
customer_reviews.author: mandy87

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's true about giving the ball a chance to fully expand. Glad I read that review before I bought it. I pumped it up to what appeared to be full capacity but knew it wasn't so I waited until the next morning and pumped it up again and then one more time that evening. Now it's at a full 65 as advertised. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble Exercise Ball
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what I expected and works exactly as expected. It's durable and I know it will last a long time with proper basic care. When purchasing this item, be sure to know what size ball you want to get because there's a difference between a 45CM, 55CM and 65CM. I purchased the 55CM ball and it's perfect for me, however, I'm 5' 6" so, if you're tall, you may want to consider the 65CM ball.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great exercise ball. It's definitely gym quality. There are five people in my house who range from 110 lbs to 330 lbs. all 4 have used it. The younger ones have used it to sit on, the older ones for exercise. It's held up well. It comes with a pump and a couple of extra calves to closing, and a tool for removing the valve. It also come with clear instructions for how to know if it's full enough. In addition, there are videos online from the company with exercise ideas.
customer_reviews.author: JNS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ball...
customer_reviews.text: While i like the product, the way it was delivered was sloppy suggesting it was a returned item. I returned the first time and got a second similar item in exact same sloppily slapped together box that suggested that it was a returned item too. I decided to keep it because I wanted to get on with my exercises. The other Dynapro product that I purchased (bands) had no such issues and also appear to be of good quality. So overall would recommend Dynapro products but wish they would deliver products brand new products.
customer_reviews.author: Desiguy29

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and instructions
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get the right size ball for your height. Hate to do this but here's the link to another brand that shows how to size if you scroll down. Dynapro should have this when you click on it but it doesn't as with most of the exercise balls online. But I'm very happy with the purchase. Came with extra pins too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S Moss

customer_reviews.title: Good size, color and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 65 cm. I am 5'4" . Perfect size for me. I am 73. I ordered pink because my bedroom is pink. Therefore ball blends with bedroom color. Love it. It is perfectly large. Nice quality. Went to car wash place to initially fill, the attendant there was kind enough to fill it while I held it. It kinda takes 2 people to fill initially. The pump sent with it is too small for this size ball. I will use that pump to maintain the air pressure but not to fill for the first time. So glad I purchased this particular ball for color, size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in this stability ball
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this stability ball, I have been a personal trainer for almost 30 years and I expect when I inflate one of these balls that they will be somewhat firm, this one was not and for my purposes not that useable.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and a good product
customer_reviews.text: Update: this company has amazing customer service and reached out immediately to correct the issue. They corrected all errors and did it in a very timely way!!! I bought this ball in September. I hardly use it and 3now it doesnt hold air. It got low but not completely deflated and maintained its round shape so i pumped it back up yesterday and this morning it is back to a smaller round version of its self. Im concerned because i bought two smaller versions for my kids for christmas that are stashed in the closet in boxes. Im hoping they don't end up doing the same thing and then I've wasted money on 3 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Foster

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.  Five Stars.
customer_reviews.text: DYNAPRO Exercise Ball - 2,000 lbs Stability Ball - Professional Grade - I bought this for my wife to use, as she has occasional back pain. Using the ball helps relieve her back pain, in addition to the limitless number of exercises you can do with it. This is one of the better quality balls I've seen and used before. No complaints. Five Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Slapshot

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose Exercise Ball
customer_reviews.text: Was in an auto accident. While attending physical theropy the assistant suggested that better progress couldbe made at home if there was a ball there to use for practicing the excerises. SInce having the ball it has also doubled as a chair at the work desk when working from home. It is heavy rubber. the pattern on the ball helps to make it stable. It is well made. It provides confidence while using it and that it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I think this swiss ball is excellent in terms of quality. I didn't realize that I ordered the smallest ball, so when it arrived and first pumped it up I was definitely surprised at how small it was, but then I waited 24 hours and let the material stretch, and pumped it up again with better results. It's still on the small side, but I can still perform the movements I need to. But the size was my mistake, the quality of the product is excellent, thick and is air tight. I would definitely order from this company again. Oh, and the pump worked fine for me, no issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: ZWElam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty simple concept.
customer_reviews.text: Using it in a home combo office exercise room. A little large for the room, but I store it in another room when I'm not using it. It is a nice little addition. I can do mini bar bell bench presses, sit ups without back strain, and balancing exercises. I don't notice any pain relief per one of features I'm supposed to rate. I'm not sure how it would alleviate any pain, except sit ups not hurting my back. It is a good heavy weight material and handles my 170 pounds without any trouble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is as represented
customer_reviews.text: It's just what it's supposed to be - a balance/exercise ball. What can I say? It's round like a ball. It's inflatable and it inflates. I ordered gray and it's gray. Like a ball it bounces and rolls around. The pump that comes with it will eventually inflate it, but don't be in a hurry. If you pump too fast friction takes over the pump freezes up and you have to let it cool down before it will work again. If you have a bicycle pump the process will go much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mikell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to do a lot of core exercises, this is awesome. Laying on the floor and doing crunches all day won't be as hard as doing them on a ball while balance off the mat. The only reason I don't give these guys 5 stars is because it seems like I have to pump up the ball every few weeks as it's a little leaky. However, they send you extra air stoppers and a blow up tool so it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: JBurr

customer_reviews.title: 55 CM was too small for me
customer_reviews.text: The guide was off and I chose a ball that was too small. I am 5’6” and bought the 55 cm. I’m using it in place of a workout bench. Here is a guide I found in another site. 4'11" to 5'4" height: 55 cm ball 5'4" to 5'11" height: 65 cm ball 5'11" to 6' 7" height: 75 cm ball Otherwise, the ball was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: maybe they should size by leg length
customer_reviews.text: I am 5foot 1 and got the ball for my size. Not a good fit, I do have a 28 inch inseam, knees are way above my hips. The ball is a good quality, instructions easy to follow, but it is to small for me. Will keep it to do back stretches but I got another ball for sitting on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball to use for task seating. Followed the inflation instructions to the letter, but have never been able to reach the promised diameter. Also, no matter how solidly seated the plug, the ball would not stay fully inflated. I've used a different brand as my 10-hour-a-day work seat for over two years, and have only had to top off air twice; same for the different brand I use as my home office seating. The one positive is that it's a pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Manually have to pump air into it
customer_reviews.text: As far as it goes, it's a nice product. It work very well. It's strong enough to support me at 230LBS. However, it has a hand pump which is designed to fit the hole that lets air in and out, so it takes some time and is tiring work. Also, it's difficult to blow up to the firmness that I'd prefer and with the design of the air hole, it makes finding an adaptor so it can be blown up using an air compressor, difficult. However, I'm using it daily and it's working fine.
customer_reviews.author: wadkinsjames

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than budget balls. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after returning a different brand. Send the extra money and get this ball, the material is thicker and you'll have a better experience one this is inflated properly. The downside is that it is harder to inflate, zero chance you'll get proper inflation with the included pump. I didn't dock a star for that, because that goes for all balls. The ball itself is top quality, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: AJM

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Stability Ball
customer_reviews.text: This stability ball is identical to one I bought over 10 years ago following a back injury, and that one is still functional. Needed a second stability ball for a different location after a recurrence of back issue. Seems well made and holds air very well. The inclusion of a hand pump was nice since I didn't have one. Be patient when pumping the ball up -- it takes time but it does work. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NavySpy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, FAST shipping! Got here a day earlier than quoted. 👍🏼 This ball is exactly what I was hoping for. I’m a big guy and I feel safe on this ball. As another person stated below, inflate the ball and wait 24hrs (don’t use it). After the ball has had 24hrs to stretch, re-inflate to size and put in your plug. (Also, I used a non-serated butter knife to get the plug out. Super easy). Thanks for an excellent and fairly priced stability ball!
customer_reviews.author: Tricky

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: I am using a 65cm ball for a chair at work. When it initially arrived, the plug and tool were missing from the box. Contacted DynaPro via email and the president (!) responded within the hour and I received a plug and tool in the mail a few days later without the hassle of a return and reorder. Great customer service! Pump works well for inflating, and the ball holds air well - have not had to add any in the first week of it being sat on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Boarman

customer_reviews.title: 55 is perfect 65 is a little thinner feeling and huge!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both own exercise balls and I really like the dynopro. The first one I had bought had a small leak and I felt I had bought a size to small so when they offered to replace it I asked for a larger size. However, the 65 is HUGE! I should of stayed with the 55 for 2 reasons. It felt "thicker" and it wasn't as large. I enjoyed the stability of the 55 way more. So, if you are shorter the 55 is great! My fiance uses the 65 now because he's 6 ft and I still use my slow leak 55 lol.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: I love my DynaPro Exercise Ball and elastic bands so much that I have also ordered two sets of them for my family
customer_reviews.text: I love my DynaPro Exercise Ball and elastic bands so much that I have also ordered two sets of them for my grown children who live with their families in other states. Together, the ball and elastic bands serve for complete daily exercises in the home; for the arms, the upper body and the core that I complement with walking or using an elliptical exerciser. The product quality is outstanding, the price is very affordable and the delivery was right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Sinnreich

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercising.. your forearms to pump then to do abs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife so she can stretch and workout her abs. The pros: once inflated the ball is sturdy and comfortable to lay on. Easy to get some exercise and stretches. Definitely works. The cons: takes a decent amount of time to pump. She was unable to pump the ball. It was getting easily dirty and picking up a lot of stuff on the floor. It came with a small little hole that we fixed with some duck tape.
customer_reviews.author: Joon yi

customer_reviews.title: Dynapro is on the ball!
customer_reviews.text: Did lots of research and this one was rated one of the best. I’m glad I bought it. Ball keeps air much better than last one. Wasn’t sure I was going to like the pump when I first used it to inflate the ball for the first time, the different repetition was a bit uncomfortable, but after using it to do a quick refill I decided I like it better than the accordion style hand pump. It’s less awkward to use, and the kit comes with a plastic pick to pull out the plug. Much easier than breaking a nail!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: leaking bad... I really should have listen to other one star reviewer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a month ago and it start leaking after 2 weeks... it require to refilled every 4 hours, and the air pump head detached from its body.
customer_reviews.author: Apen

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 2 months and then sprung a leak a ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 2 months and then sprung a leak a few inches from the inflation hole while in use. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cargill Martek

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Ball is missing the thing that holds the air in the ball. After inflating it just let's it out. Update: customer service responded to my review and sent me 2 new plugs. The ball now works as intended and everyone at the office loves it. Someone even brought their kids in on the weekend and they had a blast on it. If I could change it, I would probably of bought the 65 cm one as the 75 cm is very large.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ball makes a great desk chair.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I bought this to use as a chair at my desk and it's the most comfortable chair I ever had. I thought my back would hurt or my arms would get tired without armrests but so far they haven't. The only issue I have with it is getting it close enough not to roll away while I'm getting on to be close to my desk. It's user error and each time I use it it gets easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves her exercise ball! I was a bit worried about the size of the ball for our tiny city apartment, but was pleasantly surprised once we inflated it. She purchased the medium size and is 5'4" tall. Not only is the ball not too large for our apartment, but also is the perfect size for her frame. The quality of the exercise ball is excellent and not cheap looking or feeling. It is sturdy! It also comes with its own pump which was life-saving when it came to inflating it, and it also came with spare plugs incase you loose one or break one. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jake D

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 65cm (26inches) and received the 55cm (22inches) version. The box was labeled correctly but the ball didn't match. Considering the smaller version is cheaper, I pretty much got robbed a few bucks. Also, the pump gets jammed mid pump. Will return unless the company reaches out to me to have this fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: ONLY A 30 DAY RETURN POLICY!
customer_reviews.text: For several weeks it was great but then noticed it was slowly losing air. Thought it could be a change in the temperature. Now I have a huge deflated hunk of plastic. And of course the seller only gives a 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Keiley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Dynapro ball and they are fantastic. We got our first at a garage sale and it lasted years. I have back problems so I try to use it whenever I need to sit. This ball is sturdy and can hold a lot of weight. The price is great for such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Angel L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy ball.
customer_reviews.text: The ball came with no directions of how to inflate. I have never had an item that I had to inflate before so it took me a while to figure it out. It took about an hour to inflate the ball. It’s hard to say whether I have the right amount of air in it or not. But I weigh 280 pounds and have been bouncing up and down on it and it has not exploded so it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Vue

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The ball was great. Sturdy and definitely good quality. I'm a bit weighty and was a little afraid of a burst, but I didn't need to be! I will say though that height isn't the only thing that matters in deciding what size to get. I definitely should have sized up with my weight, as it wasn't tall enough after I sat on it. When all is said and done though, it's a great product. (The hand pump was a bit trying, but I think that's just me)
customer_reviews.author: J Poe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect During Pregnancy & Active Labor
customer_reviews.text: Used this during the last leg of pregnancy, really helped relieve lower back pain, and pressure in my hips, served its justice during active labor as well. Was easy to assemble, I'm 5"9 and bought the largest size I'm so glad I did, it was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Just a great "chair"
customer_reviews.text: I love this huge ball that I alternately use as an office chair at work and at home. Yes, I have one at both places. It's durable and has been bounced on by many of my teammates as well as myself. Get yourself one so you can ease that back pain. Sitting is the new smoking, so do it on a more flexible surface when you can. This ball will last a looonnnng time!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with my purchase. There was some confusion around what size I should buy. I use it for stretching and core exercise. Purchased the small size (I am 5’5”).
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: “Included Pump” a Joke
customer_reviews.text: So frustrating. The “included pump” is a joke. It doesn’t even work. Now I have to figure out how to inflate it. Not to mention there’s dents in the ball already from the way it was packaged so I hope it doesn’t pop once inflated and used. Definitely not buying this brand again. Do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: The Dynapro Exercise ball we purchased is the perfect addition to our home gym. It’s made of great quality material. I saw some reviews saying the ball was difficult to inflate, but I decided to give it a try since the price was reasonable. When I received the the ball, easy inflation instructions were enclosed. I followed the simple instructions and had no issues with inflating it. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our entire family enjoy it! Super flexible and easy to inflate. The quality is as great as the ball I used to use at gym before pandemic! The shipping was fast and great. I'd definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Attianno

customer_reviews.title: The ball is NOT spherical but is oblong instead
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this exercise ball for two months. The ball was relatively easy to inflate and did not smell. That being said, the ball is NOT spherical and instead has more of an oblong shape. This means that it does not stay in place and rolls around on its own. It is very difficult to get my balance on the ball and also difficult to use it for exercises since my body is never positioned on it the same way twice.
customer_reviews.author: John G Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It still functions well but would be a little more comfortable just a bit higher off the ground
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sit on during my third trimester of pregnancy, and hopefully to use after baby is born to bounce and soothe baby. I got the 55cm option because I am short (5'3") but I wish I had gone one size higher. It still functions well but would be a little more comfortable just a bit higher off the ground. On those nights when I just can't get comfortable anywhere else, this is wonderful. I can sit and bounce on it and relieves my back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: There are multiple vendors who distribute such therapy balls. No clue how many actual manufacturers are out there selling to distributors but I do know quality can vary greatly. This is a quality exercise/therapy ball rated by someone who has used them for personal use and patient use for many years. About $10 more than comparable sized balls but this brand I know to be a good product that will withstand some use and abuse!
customer_reviews.author: Hail to the Chief !

customer_reviews.title: Filling This Ball With Air Is Exercise Enough
customer_reviews.text: The pump that is provided only worked to fill the ball about half way. After that I had to improvise. Very difficult. If you have a back problem this will only make it worse. The company provider should have given alternatives to their pump (provided) for filling the ball with air. The process required about 30 minutes of misery. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Read the review
customer_reviews.text: I would like to review the packaging. Very strong smell of plastic once opened, also a lot of lube on the pump that it came with, was very disgusting. As for pumping, took me 10 minutes of rapidly pumping. Wish the pump was a bit better quality. Hasn't popped yet, did feel like it was going to when I got on it (I'm 185lbs). Will give it another star if it lasts me a couple of more months.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Chun

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I was pregnant to help with hip pain. It was very hard to inflate and after using it, I had to pump it up again. Super annoying but overall it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne

customer_reviews.title: Does its job once you get it pumped up.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little difficult to pump, it took a long time and I had to keep stopping and coming back to it later because the pump would get stuck and wouldn't let me put more air in, but once I finally got it pumped up to the right size and let it sit 24 hours without using it, it works just fine. I appreciated that the product came with three stoppers for the hole and a little tool to pry the stopper out, although it is difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stable for Tall People
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband who is 6’4”. The ball is big enough and sturdy enough to maintain for workouts and assist with back rehab.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A

customer_reviews.title: Love my new stability ball!
customer_reviews.text: I marked low on stability but that's just because I'm still learning how to balance myself on the ball. I use it near a piece if furniture like a bed or a chair. It helps me eork on my stability while on the ball. (Keeps me from falling over or rolling off the thing😉) The ball itself is awesome. Easy to inflate and use. Although I'm still trying to figure out how to navigate the app. And my abbs burn like never before after crunchs on the ball. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Woodworth

customer_reviews.title: it's good.
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've had this ball for a while, I noticed that I keep on having to add air to it. It doesn't seem to stay inflated to the level I want it. Other than that, it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy gums

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy Bouncy During Video Calls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to sit at my desk at work - wasn't sure I'd like it especially since I work up to 65 hour weeks at the computer. (Yea, I know.) Only problem so far is the team I work with aren't too happy with my being "bouncy bouncy" during team meeting video calls. So guess I need to stop doing that. Otherwise, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wintersun

customer_reviews.title: Great to have a 55 cm ball
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a 55 cm ball that fits my 5'3" body!! Can't tell you how many 65 cm balls I've had to try to use-- it's really important to get a size that fits to get the most out of the exercise, and not hurt yourself! I definitely recommend selecting the size that's right for you according to their size chart.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Good product, after smell dissipates.
customer_reviews.text: This thing stinks! Strong chemical smell burns my eyes... Update, after several weeks the strong chemical smell has dissipated. After a week of pumping more air into this yoga ball with the included hand pump. The ball works great: as a seat for watching TV, working on computer, and a source of amusement for the kids. Comfortably supports my 350lb. son, while my 75lb. daughter uses the ball to work on her balancing act:) Good product at a good price, prime shipping delivered sooner than expected. All around good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Legally Blind Geek

customer_reviews.title: Pump don't work.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a better review but I cannot inflate the ball to the correct size with the air pump provided. I'm going to have to buy a whole extra item just to use this properly. It also loses air quickly. I don't know if it's supposed to be inflated after every use, or if the seal doesn't sit right because I can't properly inflate it, either way it loses pressure rather quickly. Yes, it still works, works great in fact. I just wish I could have used it properly right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: The pump is garbage
customer_reviews.text: This review is specifically about the pump that comes with the ball. It is a piece of garbage that broke within 3 minutes and significantly less than half way to inflating the ball sufficiently. It quickly became impossible to retract the pump in order to prime it to inject air into the ball. Completely pissed off and disappointed I can’t even use this friggin thing because the pump is the cheapest least effective thing I’ve ever had to use
customer_reviews.author: Robert Foster

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t live without an exercise ball now!!
customer_reviews.text: Laying on my back over the ball and lifting my arms all the way up over my head and extended to floor, is the best back stretch. I bought this “used, cosmetic imperfections” and it was perfectly fine. I see some imperfections but they make no difference.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ratz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This was not as expected... size was a lot smaller than what I was expecting. The color is as expected, a quality so far seems to be OK but will know after I have it for a week or 2. this is just an out of the box review. Update. This ball buried 5/2020 after only 5 months of continual use 😕
customer_reviews.author: Nicka

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use as my desk chair, and I can tell a big difference in 1 day of use! I definitely got my arm workout in while inflating it but I DID buy the ball to get more activity into my day ;) I am 5'2 but ordered the 65in ball because my desk sits a little higher. It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Able to Burst Quickly...
customer_reviews.text: These balls aren't unburstable. My 75lb son burst 2 balls in about 4 days from working out on them.
customer_reviews.author: Shayohna

customer_reviews.title: Important part of a good workout
customer_reviews.text: This exercise ball is exactly as described, a very well made, flexible exercise ball that lets me attain the great workout that I want and once you register you can print out visual aids that help you hit every part of your body that needs conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Hoff

customer_reviews.title: it is an excellent product. It is very well-made
customer_reviews.text: I am a GTM Personal Trainer. I have been teaching GTM for nearly twenty-seven years. Throughout my career, I have used many pieces of equipment by different manufacturers. I suppose, based on my experience, I can be considered well-qualified to evaluate the Dyapro Exercise Ball. Simply put, it is an excellent product. It is very well-made, attractive, and easy to pump up. I highly recommend it. Cheerio, Bijan
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bijan Gilani

product_meta.title: DYNAPRO Exercise Ball – Extra Thick Eco-Friendly & Anti-Burst Material Supports Over 2200lbs – Stability Ball for Home, Gym, Chair, Birthing Ball
feature_bullets: BUILT TO LAST: Get a quick start on optimizing your health -- every box we ship contains an Exercise Ball that inflates using the hand pump that goes with it. Within minutes, you can use it as a stability ball in any kind of fitness training such as yoga or Pilates, or as a desk chair to correct your posture and support your back when you work.

MADE FROM 100% RECYCLED MATERIAL: Our stability balls have a superior anti-burst material with a thickness of 2275 micrometers which delivers a greater degree of resistance to sharp objects on the floor or on your clothing that may come in contact with the ball.

HEAVY DUTY ANTI-BURST RATING CAN MATCH ANY HEAVYWEIGHT: Our Exercise Ball is manufactured using gym quality standards. When used properly, it can carry the stress of heavy loads up to 2200 lbs without popping to prevent you from being injured. Excess loads above this weight will cause the ball to deflate slowly to ensure your safety.

NON-SLIP RIBBED BODY STAYS PUT WITH SKIN CONTACT: The PVC body has a matte surface with horizontal ribs contoured all around it -- making it easy to hold without slipping while tossing, bouncing or squeezing the ball even with profuse sweat.

FOUR SIZE OPTIONS FOR YOUR COMFORT AND SAFETY: 45cm, 55cm, 65cm, 75cm Not sure which is the right size for you? Our size guide helps you determine which size Exercise Ball best matches your intended use based on your body height if used for exercise, and the desk height if used as a chair.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
